actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the offering of prayer in public schools.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that nothing contained in the U.S. Constitution shall be construed to prohibit the authority administering any school, school system, or educational institution supported in whole or in part from any public funds from providing for the voluntary participation by the students thereof in regularly scheduled periods of nonsectarian prayer.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the offering of prayer in public schools.
